title: Microsoft rolls out Windows 10 build 19044.1586 – here’s what’s new
content:
We’re once again at the second Tuesday of a new month, and that means it’s Patch Tuesday. Microsoft is rolling out cumulative updates for all supported versions of Windows, including Windows 11 and Windows 10. While Windows 10 isn’t getting any big new features anymore, these updates should improve stability and reliability overall. As a

The post Microsoft rolls out Windows 10 build 19044.1586 – here’s what’s new appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has released Windows 10 build 19044.1586 as part of this month's Patch Tuesday, fixing an issue with factory resets and OneDrive.
